tiptext:
Logan K. • Décembre 5, 2015
Good coffee and good music. Worth spending an afternoon here.

Stefan B. • Mai 29, 2019
Le paradis des pâtisseries !

Lisa S. • Mars 27
Amazing seafood! The char and the mashed cod were both yummy.

Katie F. • Décembre 1, 2016
Excellent architecture

Iceland I. • Juillet 6, 2013
Toujours aussi cool comme lieu et il y a toujours une surprise musicale lorsque je viens, la terrasse est un must pour les longues journées d'été....

Blaise C. • Janvier 6, 2018
Grab the Shellfish soup in a breadbowl! + the owner is super friendly and entertaining 10/10 would come back again!

Lisa S. • Mars 27
Great burgers! Also plentiful options on the drink menu.

Natacha D. • Mars 19, 2017
Icelandic traditional food, main courses are good but this restaurant is too overrated!! Cuisine traditionnelle Islandaise, bon pour un plat principal mais resto surcoté

John R. • Décembre 4, 2020
Very nice park in a quiet location. In the summer people play all sorts of sports here.

Victoria W. • Janvier 7, 2015
My favorite neighborhood grocer. For such a tiny grocer the selection is unbeatable. Sushi selection for a quick meal totally recommended

Kazem E. • Décembre 3, 2015
Great coffee, nice location, good service, and delicious croissants. Definitely worth visiting. Good music from their vinyl records too!

maite a. • Novembre 27, 2016
Trendy coffeeshop. Really good coffee. A place to relax after a walk in the center of Reykjavik. Pastry is also good

Kaitlin • Septembre 16, 2022
What a spectacular and beautiful meal. The lobster soup with scallop, apple, and cardamom should not be missed. We also loved the sushi. Thought it compared to sushi we’ve had in renowned spots.

Iceland I. • Juillet 5, 2013
Ouvert pendant la saison d'été uniquement je vous recommande les moules islandaises mariés aux French Fries ! :-)

Arnór J. • Août 24, 2011
Great tubs! You have to tryout the waterslide!

L. Q. • Juin 11, 2016
Great selection of draft beer. Happy hour with better prices from 14h-19h (!!!). Good and friendly environment.

Del P. • Avril 21, 2017
This is the best coffeehouse in Reykjavik. The food and coffee are both great.

Adrien D. • Octobre 13, 2013
Pour moi le meilleur restaurant de viandes/poissons d'Islande. Une adresse à ne pas manquer. Un peu cher mais tellement bon.

Eduard • Juin 17, 2016
Great walks there, and amazing views

Julie • Février 19, 2016
Difficile d'être déçu, tout est bon 👌🏻 Créatif, copieux, ambiance sympa ! Les moules, le "catch of the day"... On vous le recommande ☺️

Jess K. • Décembre 31, 2015
great service! the fish is super fresh and the entree portions are on the bigger side.

Kaitlin • Mars 16
I still dream about this place, months later. Pure perfection. We did the 7-step ritual, but the lagoon alone is also great. We heard from multiple people it was better than Blue, too.

Henrik O. • Mars 24, 2017
The food is excellent here! We tried many dishes, and they were all top notch.

Aurélie V. • Juin 27, 2018
La place est super cute et l’ambiance est agréable et relaxante. Le service à la clientèle est bon et la nourriture réconfortante. Même pour un cafe et un dessert ça vaut la peine!!! 10/10

Hannah • Février 27, 2019
We went to the Reykjavik for a lunch. They offer a nice lunch menu for reasonable prices, from which we chose the fish of the day - it was absolutely amazing!

Andrea A. • Février 15, 2016
One of the best gyms around, lovely atmosphere and well equipped

Eggert G. • Septembre 23, 2018
Awesome selection of BrewDog beers and local craft beers. Very impressive food menu & overall great atmosphere 🤟

Olesya • Octobre 31, 2014
Хороший городской парк

Martien B. • Juillet 15, 2018
Here you can have a coffee or a nice bowl of soup at very reasonable prices. Read a book, work your laptop, it's all OK here.

Juliette C. • Mai 30, 2018
L’architecture extérieure est très laide et l’intérieur dénué de tout. Très peu propice à la méditation.

John P. • Janvier 22, 2017
Super cozy. Reasonable prices (... for Iceland!).

Maria • Août 13, 2015
Great place with big variety of records. You can spend here half day wandering the shop.

Jason J. • Mars 4, 2022
Make sure to get a reservation! Any salad you order is amazing. The steak is great too

Tania Y. • Janvier 24, 2017
Place to try Icelandic food and beer, they have a little bit of everything on the menu. Good service and cozy atmosphere

Arnór H. • Août 15, 2017
Flatbread with hummus and paprika spread, roasted cauliflower and lamb ribs are my fave. All the cocktails are amazing.

Risiana L. • Février 7, 2015
Beautiful sculpture on the boulevard of Reykjavík. Reflects the sunlight perfectly so try to see it at sunrise, sunset or on a sunny day!

Erick K. • Septembre 22, 2014
Great store with an even greater selection. The owners (+ staff) are really helpful, and nice to chat with as well. Best menswear store in Reykjavík.

champ1: Canopy by Hilton Reykjavik City Centre
tiptext:
Ronald D. • Août 25, 2017
Great location in the heart of Reykjavik. Lovely staff and they have comfy socks in each room to make you feel at home

David B. • Octobre 17, 2017
A fun collection of wine bars, food and restaurants. There are shared benches so everyone can get something different. Recommendation: Glass of wine at Kröst.

Max M. • Décembre 27, 2014
Amazing lamb shank, best lamb I've ever eaten, maybe the best Indian food as well

Catherine W. • Août 17, 2018
Really nice museum with a lot to see. They even have free lockers to hold your stuff during your visit. Definitely worth it, especially if you have a the Reykjavík city card.

Kaitlin • Septembre 10, 2022
Best coffee stop in Iceland. Coffee’s sourced from a local one-woman roaster right in town. Both the filter coffee and the espresso are great — filter comes with free refills.

Þorgeir K. B. • Novembre 29, 2013
Englar alheimsins er mögulega skemmtilegasta leikrit sem ég hef farið á. Sorg, gleði, tilfinningar, geðveiki og hlátur eru allt þættir sem verkið inniheldur og auðvitað sígild lög Bítlana. Haxleikrit!

Quest S. • Mars 10, 2015
Carefully selected whisky and beer. Great cuts, awesome atmo. Free wi/fi, and frendly helpfull staff. For an appointment or just to hang out. Slainte!

Chris B. • Novembre 16, 2022
Amazing selection of vegan and regular small plates. Great service!

S P. • Septembre 20, 2016
Very nicely located downtown next to the main road. Great value for money given service, comfort, breakfast and location.

Frances G. • Juillet 8, 2017
They do accommodate to vegans. However, they ask for a 24 hr notice. Believe me you won't regret it. 100% delicious!

Monika Š. • Septembre 3, 2018
Amazing place and meals in Reykjavik! I was there three times with my friends. Nice atmospehe, services and especially the meals and drinks! I really recomend this place!!!

Titre: Ingólfsstræti 2a (Next to Sólon - Across from Næsti Bar), Reykjavik
tiptext:
Stephanie • Décembre 30, 2016
One of the nicest concert halls I've been in. Head upstairs for seats or slide in on the ground floor to get close to the stage.

Jordan K. • Mars 17, 2013
Absolutely amazing food: open-face sandwiches and daily hot food specials. They also serve Akvavit shots that locals typically enjoy with a beer.

Herwig S. • Avril 11, 2011
Best coffee in town. A bit pricy, but worth it

MiNuS M. • Octobre 26, 2016
De bonnes frites avec des sauces sympas...

Blanche N. • Novembre 4, 2014
Awesome and super cozy place. Nice sandwiches and soup but don't order coffee if you are true coffee lover.

Franziska • Janvier 26, 2020
The tasting menu is fantastic. Such a nice Icelandic culinary experience!

Gummi J. • Août 25, 2015
Great simple burgers, get the Bernaise sauce with the fries and you are golden.

Jude R. • Février 4, 2014
Servi en moins d'une seconde pour le hot-dog élu meilleur au monde en 2013. Donc que dire à part parfait, rapide, atypique, délicieux, génial et c'est vrai que c'est un orgasme ce food porn.

Jacqueline W. • Mars 3
Good variety of sweet and salty alternatives for breakfast. Good coffee and friendly stuff. good value for money.

Arnt E. • Octobre 11, 2014
Grilled Lamb is a given. Chocolate dessert is amazing

Stacey H. • Mai 27, 2016
Modern, cosy decor. Helpful front desk staff. Fancy Aveda shampoo/conditioner!

Jerry B. • Janvier 6
A nice room in a great location. They have an excellent restaurant and an extremely pleasant and helpful staff.

Rupert R. • Mars 9, 2018
Nice vegan pizzas, had one with cauliflower puree and cashew nuts 😋 Batch Brew was a good quality and free to refill!

Gito • Mai 6, 2014
Great place, great location and lovely staff. The best place to stay in Reykjavik!

champ1: Listasafn Reykjavíkur / Reykjavik Art Museum - Hafnarhús
tiptext:
Tansu • Juillet 15, 2013
This is the best choice to spend a rainy day in Reykjavík, enjoy!

Kristinn J. • Décembre 28, 2014
The steak burger is by fsr the best burger you can get in Reykjavík.

Auðunn V. • Juin 10, 2016
Small nice stadium. Quick entrance.

Natacha D. • Novembre 16, 2017
Je vous conseille vivement le plateau de dessert!!

Christophe K. • Juillet 29, 2016
🇧🇷 Tout est bon ici !!!Et l'ambiance "Braziuuuuuu" 🇧🇷

Steve R. • Octobre 4, 2016
Swiss Mocha and Chai Latte were great. Their Banana Nut Bread is amazing, too.

Yuko M. • Février 27, 2015
Friendly and helpful staff. Great location, clean and updated room! I would love to come back!

Rowan W. • Octobre 13, 2015
Good little healthy food franchise.. Nice salad bar and tasty breadless burgers.

Fulya M. • Septembre 16, 2016
The food was amazing! The service was great! Their lamb is yummmm!

Ryan B. • Mars 30, 2018
Possibly the best snack we had in Iceland! Lamb shawarma is amazing! Would go back to Iceland just for Mandi’s!

Andreas • Mars 22
Great coffee ☕️

Ali A. • Juillet 22, 2018
Friendly reception, good sized room clean bathroom room and more important the location was perfect

Lauren D. • Septembre 18, 2017
omg the cinnamon buns (which are not the same as the breakfast cinnamon croissants) are amazing and only happen after 11am.

Asoomii B. • Août 23, 2019
Love it, specially they have other than lamp soup options for vegans.

John L. • Mai 9
The Icelandic people really know how to do seafood! 👍🏻

Ronni Tino • Juillet 28, 2011
Great little arthouse cinema! Arrive in time to enjoy a cup of coffee in the cozy café.

Debbie D. • Août 17, 2014
Saw an evening performance of music & philosophy combined into an amazing thoughtful work of art.

Valur Thor G. • Avril 20, 2012
Get anything. It's all good.

Mu-An . • Mars 14, 2016
Just like any freshly fried donuts, but TINY and delicious! ❤️

Cathrine J. • Novembre 6, 2016
So many Icelandic knitted sweaters! They are knitted in Iceland with wool from the local sheeps. It's expensive but you get 14% back in tax-free. Blankets, hats, gloves ++.The cheapest knitting place!

Caroline C. • Août 18, 2019
Super bon thaï

Maria K. • Août 8, 2015
Nice little square with benches to relax on.

Florence M. • Août 22, 2015
Restaurant organisé pour les touristes, avec un staff très agréable.

Maggi • Mars 4, 2019
The bar closer to the entrance is always the less busy one.

Robert Ingi D. • Novembre 17, 2019
Great little bakery with a Czech twist

Cathrine J. • Novembre 6, 2016
A super cute place with many, many photos taken in Iceland by a local photographer. The walls are also covered in old, vintage cameras! Make sure to bring a photo home with you.

Brendan M. • Juillet 6, 2021
the beer, of course. the Moscow mule is also surprisingly good

Maggi • Mai 15
Get any of the "Spes" pizzas, all excellent.

champ1: Ylströndin í Nauthólsvík | Nauthólsvík Geothermal Beach
tiptext:
Lydia U. • Août 9, 2015
Great hot pool! Come here for the "real" Icelandic bathing experience. It's free and there are showers, toilets, lockers and even a small shop. Great place to relax!

Karmen N. • Juin 21, 2016
Very lovely hotel! I recommend! Nice staff, pretty rooms, natural cosmetic etc..

Rob H. • Décembre 31, 2016
Free Wi-Fi and right in the middle of a great part of the city.

Maria K. • Juin 24, 2015
Really nice during sunset.

Dan G. • Novembre 20, 2015
Great, friendly vibe and always a group willing to dance! Beer is cheap; mixed drinks not so much.

Rafn Àgúst R. • Août 11, 2014
Everything is incredibly good here, i would reccomend a Bragðarefur with at least some cookie dough and oreo's 😄😄😄

أسيل العبداللطيف .. • Janvier 18
Pecan pie and apple pie was very yum, their black coffee is perfect 👍🏼

Andrew S. • Août 9, 2015
Great place to stay. Super close to everything, quiet, big beautiful apartments.

Óskar Á. • Février 18, 2015
The selection of Icelandic games and the service.

Jorge P. • Mai 27, 2015
Awesome place, awesome decoration. Regular music.

Agnieszka S. • Mai 3, 2015
One of the best hostels, I've ever been to. Close to everything you need, the staff is really friendly, they have good music in the lounge and the breakfasts are nice and free. Very clean and modern.

Carl G. • Novembre 28, 2015
Cute little church near the lake.

Jeffrey K. • Juillet 28, 2016
Cool space shared with a book store with lots of cool knick knacks. Great souvenir options here.

Bárður Örn G. • Octobre 16, 2011
A true Milan Coffee Bar at one of the nicest streets in Reykjavík. Great Coffee on the run, interesting crowd, you might spot Icelandic celebrities.

Carter S. • Février 24, 2011
If you are looking in Reykjavick for somewhere with a warm friendly feeling, and a hearty menu full of local favourites this is the place! Try Minky Whale shashimi style or as a peppered steak!

Sravanti T. • Juin 14, 2018
Self check in was hassle-free, free street parking, and very clean. Great for the basics.

Lulu D. • Novembre 18, 2017
My room was spacious, clean and very comfortable. The 24hr from desk and daily cleaning is also great to have. Also it’s in an absolute great location, just one block away from restaurants and bars.

Erick K. • Juillet 30, 2015
Beautiful house and space. The house is a design by Alvar Aalto. They have a little shop, a simple bistro and a very cool library. They host various events from time to time.

Skuli A. • Avril 13, 2017
Cosy coffee shop, with great coffee. A bit pricey.

Kvn R. • Juin 26, 2013
Pas trop cher, des assiettes bonnes et bien remplies, un cadre agréable, un service aimable, et du Wi-Fi gratuit.

Hannah K. • Juillet 26, 2019
Love this place! The ice cave was amazing. Cool exhibits and wonderful view from the rooftop.

Fred S. • Août 24, 2018
Extensive buffet breakfast. All of the meals I had were quite good.

Phil W. • Octobre 8, 2012
Reykjavik's coolest clothing shop. They carry several Farmer's Market brand sweaters. I wish I had a store like this where I live.

Agnèsita • Avril 3, 2017
Tout est absolument excellent et le service extrêmement sympathique. Une adresse idéale à Reykjavik !!

Max M. • Mai 8, 2014
Amazing living. Cheap prices. Fresh rooms. Great bar with live music. Wonderful people.

Marel J. • Mai 26, 2016
By far the best Te og Kaffi cafe in town! They might not have the greatest varieties of sandwiches or cakes, but the coffee is great.

Eymundsson • Août 12, 2011
A flower lover? The Botanic Garden is an outdoor collection of about 5000 living plants and it celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2011. Check link for a book about Icelandic plants.

Muriel V. • Septembre 6, 2014
Quiet, safe and amazing amenities. A cheap stay with your camper or tent. 👍

Aurélie G. • Juin 21, 2015
Petit café / restaurant sympa dans le jardin botanique . Agréable les jours de beaux temps . Pas de la grande cuisine mais des produits frais .

Ryan B. • Mars 30, 2018
Great craft beer from all over the country! Would recommend the flight served on Iceland shape tray with beers from each coast of Iceland. (Oh and the free waffles are a good point!)

Jeff M. • Avril 12, 2015
Cozy Reykjavik haunt - a great place to have an evening beer!

Maciej W. • Janvier 16, 2016
The environment was amazing and they have many books that you can read (mainly about bread making). I sat inside for about 3 hours before the sun came up. I had a cup of Americano coffee & sugar

Stefán Ö. • Avril 15, 2012
West side is the best.

Emilie F. • Novembre 21, 2015
It might feel weird to go to a hostel bar but the food is delicious and it's a wonderful place to hang out on a rainy afternoon.

Herwig S. • Juillet 13, 2011
Icecream 'old style' is colder and more watery preferred by adults. Icecream 'new style' is more creamy and kids love it

Maud • Août 6, 2019
Very good homemade pastries with loads of vegan options. Good atmosphere and lovely staff. Really liked it!

Árni Þ. • Janvier 31, 2012
Remember that Nexus is now split into two stores. The original one sells books & movies and the one across the parking lot sells board games and rpgs.

Antoine P. • Août 16, 2016
Chocolat chaud

Andrew R. • Juin 23, 2016
Really good tasting menu and best wine pairings Ive had in Iceland (although still not amazing). Bit on the expensive side but definitely worth it

Benedikt V. • Mai 4, 2015
Love the lasagna! Also always have a 'pasta of the day' that never fails to please

Bjarni J. • Avril 1, 2017
This is now a favorite of mine in Reykjavík. Really delicious tapas and nice latin cuisine. The atmosphere was great, and likewise the service! Here is a photo of one of the many delicacies they serve

Valur Thor G. • Juillet 8, 2011
Try the espresso. Also ask for homemade strawberry sauce with your icecream in a cup.

Musab A. • Août 26, 2019
Perfect, outstanding, amazing. Just can’t describe it. So cheap, has everything

Christine T. • Avril 25, 2018
Just across the Food court at Hlemmur. Good thaifood, good value for the money.

Gary S. • Novembre 2, 2018
Amazing soft tacos!!! I had the pollo x3 and added the red spicy sauce to it. Very strong. Highly recommend. One of the best taco joints I have been too.

Levaker • Mars 19, 2016
Keeping Iceland warm for real! Love the products and great limited edition jackets.

Andrea A. • Février 6, 2015
Best breakfast place in Reykjavík. Interiors are warm and inviting- exstensive menu of bagels, eggs, pancakes etc

Rhonda L. • Mars 11, 2019
Very helpful and pleasant staff. Comfortable rooms and plentiful breakfast

Eliza Ariadne K. • Août 25, 2012
Amazing clothes/ridiculously high prices (just saw a coat for 400€, wtf.)

Alana F. • Août 11, 2016
Amazing ice cream with a coconut option for vegans. The sauces and toppings (minus the white chocolate) are also all vegan. Delicious!

Risiana L. • Février 10, 2015
One of Reykjavík's main streets. Great place with nice shops, restaurants and cafes!

Aivory G. • Mai 6, 2018
My favourite bakery! Crave it when I’m not in Reykjavik. The cinnamon croissant is divine.

Risiana L. • Février 8, 2015

Michee L. • Octobre 27, 2012
Love the gift shop! So many adorable and quirky things :)

Cryunchy, fresh salad and a nice dressings.

Lovely venue to catch a show.

Betânia D. • Juin 12, 2022
Ask for tapas… the cod one is delicious.

Ben E. • Octobre 30, 2022
Great pastries and pizza, a must go.

View tip for a photo of Austurstræti around 1900. Photographer is our founder Sigfus Eymundsson bookseller in Reykjavik (Reykjavik Museum of Photography)

Carl G. • Novembre 28, 2015
Friendly service. Will help you to arrange tours and accommodation.

Don G. • Mars 17, 2014
Nice local store :)

Maggi • Janvier 5, 2019
My go to place for bread. Don't miss their pistachio bun!

Jónatan J. • Juillet 4, 2011
Get a milkshake with your burger for added flavor! Ask them to thin it out since it's to thick to drink with the burger otherwise.

Tania S. • Avril 24, 2017
Great Find! To my risotto I did not take a photo and my husband ordered the sandwich pulled pork 😋 delicious! And great service. I definitely recommend it.

Omar • Février 1, 2019
Best soup and cheesecake.

Karl H. • Juin 7, 2018
Quick, insanely tasty, healthy, fresh. Go there!

Excellent food and water, clean rooms, happy hour at the bar, Buffet, Spa and Hot Tub 20% off for Hotel customers.

Greta S. • Février 27
Nice hotel, beautiful rooms good breakfast

Nice place for a good fish and chips. Good quality cod on hand.

Florian C. • Juin 24, 2016
Ambiance cosy et boissons chaudes bien préparées. On y passe volontiers son temps libre

Julien R. • Juin 2, 2014
Concert le WE à l'étage !

Carmen N. • Août 21, 2017
Good book selection with a great pen section.

Surf and turf is awesome. So good...

Get your Siminn card there, then top it up. We payed about 30$ for 10GB and had coverage nearly everywhere.

champ1: Reykjavik Konsulat Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
tiptext:
Bogdan Z. • Décembre 21, 2022
Don’t miss the free drink between 5pm and 6pm daily!

Perfectly nice, clean and well appointed Hilton, but in a remote part of Reykjavik. If you want to be downtown, check out the Canopy!

Starfsmaður að nafni Birgitta, latur starfsmaður og ókurteis!!

Best fish store in town

Frederic B. • Septembre 8, 2021
Get all the duck dishes!

Andrea A. • Mars 7, 2017
Good food but service could be better

Muriel V. • Septembre 11, 2014
Delicious thin crust pizza! Sit down and order. I recommend the quattro stagioni. The medium pizza was cheap and enough for two people.

Lovely and cosy rooms,nice atmosphere and staff! In the middle of the center, close to everything!

Helicopter tour was greate! Views are wonderful.

champ1: Listasafn Reykjavikur / Reykjavik Art Museum - Kjarvalsstadir
tiptext:
Stephanie • Décembre 30, 2016
Small but worthy, admission from hafnarhus is good here, too and the installations are well put together.

Hlöllabomban er mjög góð.

Not centrally located, but very accessible by the city bus network. Clean, comfortable, friendly staff, and right next to a beautiful park! I stayed here for a week last October/November and loved it.
